Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Al Horford?

Al Horford is 38 years old.

Where was Al Horford born?

Al Horford was born in Puerto Plata, Dominican Republic.

When was Al Horford born?

Al Horford was born on June 3, 1986.

How tall is Al Horford?

Al Horford is 6-9 (206 cm) tall.

How much does Al Horford weigh?

Al Horford weighs 240 lbs (108 kg).

Is Al Horford in the Hall of Fame?

Al Horford is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Al Horford drafted?

Al Horford was drafted by Atlanta Hawks, 1st round (3rd pick, 3rd overall), 2007 NBA Draft.

What position does Al Horford play?

Center.

What is Al Horford's net worth?

Al Horford has made at least $279,728,232 playing professional basketball.

How much does Al Horford make?

Al Horford made $28,928,710 in 2019.

What does Al Horford average?

Al Horford averages 8.0 points, 5.4 rebounds, and 1.9 assists per game.

How many rings does Al Horford have?

Al Horford has won one championship.

What is Al Horford's Twitter account?

Al Horford is on Twitter at Al_Horford.

What is Al Horford's Instagram account?

Al Horford is on Instagram at alhorford.

What schools did Al Horford attend?

Al Horford attended Grand Ledge in Grand Ledge, Michigan and Florida.

What are Al Horford's nicknames?

Godfather is a nickname for Al Horford.
